subject: Football
Depression (Mental)
Mental Health and Disorders
lead_paragraph: Mel Renfro, a former star defensive back for the Dallas Cowboys and a member of the Pro Football Hall of Fame, participated in a recent study linking concussions to clinical depression.
snippet: Mel Renfro, a former star defensive back for the Dallas Cowboys and a member of the Pro Football Hall of Fame, participated in a recent study linking concussions to clinical depression.
